content.raw:
Maybe one last thing to add before merging is some functionality we are using in our lab bolted on to this, namely a crude preview mode. An issue we had with using these text based servers is that the only way to get a preview image out is to exit the server then re-open the camera in the manufacturer supplied program to get some sort of video mode for alignment, then close the manufacturer program and restart the server. It gets tedious.

So in the interest of a more complete, temporary solution until python-BIAS gets made, I wrote up simple hack that opens a matplotlib window with the server and configured the server window to accept keyboard command to enter and exit taking exposures at a fixed interval. It’s crude, but very simple. If there is interest I can send a PR to Dan to add to this PR.
